CustomField.description: When ticked, the Unique Code generated during redemption will encompass all Redemption Items related to a Reward. Used only for Rewards whose Stock Type is "Controlled by Quantity" or "Unlimited".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When switched on, the Unique Code generated during redemption will encompass all Redemption Items related to this Reward. Applies only if the Stock Type for this Reward is "Controlled by Quantity" or "Unlimited".
CustomField.label: Unique Voucher
